nodes.text: Dejammy Shallon was a female individual who served as a teacher and a priestess on D'janis IV. She was quoted comparing water to the Force in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of material relating to the Force compiled by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel.
Dejammy Shallon was first mentioned as part of a chapter quote in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
